txt.en:
You must be wondering why I send you on this strange chase.

It is because of your quarrel. You did not visit your mother on her death-bed, because of an old rivalry. Sigun, Sigmar, her dying wish was for you to be reconciled; it is mine as well.

Do you not see that family and hearth matter so much more than old anger?

I am about to sit down to dinner. Perhaps I will continue there. The second colour is green.

Love,
Signoth
